short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AkkenCloud CaptureME is an extension that parses information on a web page to match CRM records in AkkenCloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AkkenCloud CaptureME makes it easy. Quickly source Candidates and Contacts without having to switch between the browser windows or various websites. Eliminate the need to search and find â€” no more copy and paste. The extension works in the background without interrupting browsing. It will automatically simply indicate with different colors if a matching candidate or contact record exists in AkkenCloud database. Click to view the summary of a record retrieved from the AkkenCloud database or click to add a new record to the database. The extension also offers to view all records if it finds multiple matching records and gives the option to connect the web information to a specific record.
